summary: Adds a standalone female darkelf follower 'Bella'
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]Sorry, English is not my native Language. So I don't understand well the meaning of comments. :'(

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59362-1-1414227530.jpg[/img]

Feature:
-Adds a female darkelf follower. Her name is Bella.
-This is a Standalone mod.

Follower Info:
-Name : Bella
-Sex : Female
-Race: Dark Elf
-Body : UNP or CBBE
-CombatStyle : Shock Magic + One-handed Sword
-Location: 'Winking Skeever' in Solitude
-Spell: Sparks, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lightning Cloak, Lesser Ward, Stoneflesh
-Perk:
Sneak - Light Foot
Onehanded - Armsman, Bladesman, Savage Strike, Critical Charge, Fighting Stance
Light Armor - Agile Defender, Unhindered, Deft Movement
Destruction - Novice Destruction, Apprentice Destruction, Adept Destruction, Augmented Shock
Restoration - Novice Restoration
Alteration - Apprentice Alteration
-Essential, Marriage possible

[youtube]9jcKUZQz6QY[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url]. Thank you! :D

Recommended mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by hellosanta (If you dress her in other clothes, I recommend this mod to solve the neckline trouble)

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by hellosanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58163]Zoe's Body UNP normal map[/url] by zacki
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221]KS Hairdos - 265[/url] by Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url] by Xenius
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52407]ComfyKnight[/url] by Azraille
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54172]Katana-YotoHatamonba[/url] by cnyylzy123456789
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29137]TK Combat[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442]zzjay's wardrobe[/url] by zzjay
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652]Eldrids Armor Mashup UNP[/url] by anka01
3 Katana by Gorilla
Female face textures by Gonzo

Thanks everyone!! :D

History Log:
2014.10.25 v1.0 Released
2014.10.25 v1.1 modify a follower's face a little bit. adds talos amulet in Bella's outfit. adds optional files.

My other mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59273]Follower - Agatha[/url] (Adds a standalone female follower 'Agatha')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59419]Follower - Yeriel[/url] (Adds a standalone female follower 'Yeriel')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59970]Followers of Aber[/url] (Adds 3 standalone female followers)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61937]Males of Skyrim[/url] (Replaces the appearance of some males)[/center]
